sourcesContent:
import {useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react'; import './App.css'; function App() { const [weather, setWeather]= useState(localStorage.getItem('weather')? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('weather')):{}) const[search, setSearch] = useState('') const pageRef = useRef(null); const searchPressed = ()=>{ fetch(`https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${search}&appid=02f159f56e01ddaee4eb637903ee4690`) .then(res=>res.json()) .then(data=>setWeather(data)) setSearch(''); } useEffect(()=>{ localStorage.setItem('weather', JSON.stringify(weather)) const changeBg = ()=>{ if(weather.weather[0].main.toLowerCase() === 'clear'){ pageRef.current.style.backgroundImage = "url('./assets/clear.jpg')"; pageRef.current.style.backgroundSize = 'cover'; pageRef.current.style.backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat'; pageRef.current.style.backgroundPosition = 'center center'; } } changeBg(); },[weather]) return (

weather.com

{setSearch(e.target.value)}} type='text' placeholder='Enter location'/>

{Math.floor(weather.main.temp - 273)}

); } export default App;
